all_text_content:
Verse of the Day
And it came to pass that Enoch saw the day of the coming of the Son of Man, in the last days, to dwell on the earth in righteousness for the space of a thousand years;
Moses 7:65
Quote of the Day
"We are responsible for the choices we make based on the knowledge we have and the gifts we are given."
Elder Kevin G. Brown | 1 Oct 2025General Conference
